Description:
IN served - Failure to ensure that exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely welding fume, a known carcinogen, is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.
IN served - Failure to make and give effect to appropriate arrangements for the monitoring and review of your water-mix metalworking fluid in that you do not (a) undertake weekly testing of the metalworking fluid by appropriate tests i.e., pH, concentration and tramp oil; and you do not (b) have effective procedures for remedial actions on the basis of the test results.
